body_html:
Update: the fix to this issue has been merged to master branch of github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow.
E.g. I have personally verified this public tensorflow commit id to work at least:

36568a8
(sorry I cannot point out which exactly commit fixed this bug, but the above should already contain the fix).

Using TensorFlow backend.
Epoch 1/3
2018-09-18 15:13:11.177778: I tensorflow/core/platform/cpu_feature_guard.cc:141] Your CPU supports instructions that this TensorFlow binary was not compiled to use: AVX512F
2018-09-18 15:13:11.236624: I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/process_util.cc:69] Creating new thread pool with default inter op setting: 2. Tune using inter_op_parallelism_threads for best performance.

  • 62s - loss: 0.4231 - acc: 0.7823
    Epoch 2/3
  • 61s - loss: 0.1421 - acc: 0.9503
    Epoch 3/3
  • 60s - loss: 0.0408 - acc: 0.9895
    Accuracy: 88.38%

Thanks @cczhong11 once again for providing code for me to easily track the bug status. Enjoy the fix and thanks everyone for reporting!

body:
Update: the fix to this issue has been merged to master branch of github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow. 
E.g. I have personally verified this public tensorflow commit id to work at least: 

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/36568a821a13379b79d74586ff20bdd3e0da102b  
(sorry I cannot point out which exactly commit fixed this bug, but the above should already contain the fix). 

Using TensorFlow backend.
Epoch 1/3
2018-09-18 15:13:11.177778: I tensorflow/core/platform/cpu_feature_guard.cc:141] Your CPU supports instructions that this TensorFlow binary was not compiled to use: AVX512F
2018-09-18 15:13:11.236624: I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/process_util.cc:69] Creating new thread pool with default inter op setting: 2. Tune using inter_op_parallelism_threads for best performance.
 - 62s - loss: 0.4231 - acc: 0.7823
Epoch 2/3
 - 61s - loss: 0.1421 - acc: 0.9503
Epoch 3/3
 - 60s - loss: 0.0408 - acc: 0.9895
Accuracy: 88.38%


Thanks @cczhong11 once again for providing code for me to easily track the bug status. Enjoy the fix and thanks everyone for reporting!
